import React, { Component } from 'react' export class CardSection extends Component { render() { return (
{this.props.coinName}
Market Cap 24Hrs

{this.props.mCap24} %

All Time High

${this.props.ath}

All Time High

${this.props.atl}

Positive Sentiments

{this.props.sentiment} %

High 24Hrs

${this.props.high24}

Low 24Hrs

${this.props.low24}

Current Price
${this.props.currentPrice}
) } } export default CardSection
